marketplaces.name: dvcrn/skills
marketplaces.description: Productivity skills for CLI tools and workflows

files.README.md:
# Skills Repository

Reusable Codex skills for local workflows.

## Install

```
npx skills add dvcrn/skills
```

## Included Skills

- `memrise`: Operate the Memrise CLI (`memrise-cli` package, `memcli` binary) for course, level, words, pool, and add-item workflows.
- `tripit`: Operate and validate the TripIt CLI for trip and itinerary workflows, including CRUD operations for trips, hotels, flights, transport, activities, and document attachments.
- `wework`: Operate the WeWork CLI (`wework-cli` package, `wework` binary) for location lookup, desk availability checks, booking creation, booking listing, calendar export, and auth via `WEWORK_USERNAME` / `WEWORK_PASSWORD`.

plugins.name: memrise
plugins.description: Operate the Memrise CLI for community courses, including authentication setup, course/level/word lookup, pool searches, and adding items

plugins.description: Operate and validate the TripIt CLI for trip and itinerary workflows, including CRUD operations for trips, hotels, flights, transport, activities, and document attachments
